item.description:
Bombino (Niger)

with  

Atlas Soul ( Maghreb)


Thursday, July 14, 9:00 PM

Brighton Music Hall
158 Brighton Ave
Allston, 02134
General admission
$20.00
18+, Doors 8pm, $25.00 Day of show


Born in Agadez, a dusty desert outpost on the great Saharan camel caravan, Omara “Bombino” Moctar is a young Tuareg guitarist and songwriter whose electrifying desert-blues is reminiscent of fellow Africans Tinariwen and the late Ali Farka Touré.  Bombino is quickly gaining stature as one of Africa’s hottest guitarists on the heels of his newest release, Agadez. Atlas Soul will open.

Agadez, the Music and the Rebellion, a documentary film about the Tuareg culture featuring the music of Bombino, Tuesday, July 12, 7:30pm at the Brattle Theatre, 40 Brattle St., Cambridge. More info HERE

OFFICIAL WEBSITE http://www.bombinoafrica.com  

FREE TRACK DOWNLOAD:  "Tar Hani" 

Hear Bombino on PRI's The World... HERE
Hear Bombino on NPR Music... HERE

“A young performer with the charisma and probing imagination to become the first Tuareg star. Currents of blues and rock run through Bombino's guitar work, picked up from Jimi Hendrix records combined with influences from the group Tinariwen, and guitarists from Mali like Ali Farke Toure.” - NPR’s Fresh Air

"Some of the most sublime guitar licks you'll hear in 2011." - NPR Music

"A gem" - Boston Globe "Beautiful, passionate, refreshing music" - Exclaim

"I can't imagine any album being better than this in 2011" - Huffington Post

LINK TO STREAM FULL ALBUM: AGADEZ
http://bombino.bandcamp.com
BOMBINO AGADEZ PREVIEW: http://www.vimeo.com/19401858 
VIDEO CLIP OF "TAR HANI":  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Adfb17JQYtg
VIDEO CLIP "BOMBINO CONCERT, AGADEZ":  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fzWBow0OAeA

VIDEO CLIP "TENERE":  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W_2OSQyjnOg
TWITTER: http://twitter.com/bombinoafrica

FACEBOOK:  http://www.facebook.com/pages/Bombino/140812672646733

MYSPACE: http://myspace.com/bombinoafrica

﻿Atl﻿as Soul is an award-winning band based in Boston performing original music that celebrates and bridge Afro-Mediterranean melodies & grooves with Jazz and Funk thus naturally creating new powerful genres of music one could describe as Maghrebian-Funk, Rock’n Raï and Shaâbi-Jazz.

Their powerful live performance is guaranty to move any audience and soon have every one sing along (often in a foreign language) up & dancing & sharing the positive energy!

"Atlas Soul's blend of jazz, funk and Middle-Eastern/Arabic grooves is a fascinating sonic stew that will catch any listener's ear. This is their second appearance on our CD's compilation. We like'em, and you will too". Global Rhythm Magazine

ATLAS SOUL Web-site: http://www.atlas-soul.com 

Music /free download: http://atlas-soul.com/?section=music

Videos:

La Plus Belle: http://youtu.be/uH3mY-8ICvQ

item.name: Bombino with Atlas Soul
